name: sccccmanagement
description: Management utilities for SCCCC written in GAS

scripts.git:enforce-clean: git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || (echo "\nERROR: Git working directory is not clean. Commit or stash your changes before proceeding.\n" && git status --short && exit 1)
scripts.create-version: npm run git:enforce-clean && npm run clasp -- version "Version $(git describe --tags --always) - Git: $(git rev-parse --short HEAD) - $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')"
scripts.dev:push: npm run set-dev-env &&  npm run clasp -- push -w
scripts.dev:open: npm run set-dev-env && npm run clasp -- open
scripts.dev:deployments: npm run set-dev-env && npm run clasp -- deployments
scripts.dev:versions: npm run set-dev-env && echo "Git Tag: $(git describe --tags --always)" && echo "Git Commit: $(git rev-parse --short HEAD)" && echo "\n--- GAS Versions ---" && bash clasp-wrapper.sh versions
scripts.dev:create-version: npm run set-dev-env && npm run clasp -- versions "Dev Version $(git describe --tags --always) - $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')"
scripts.dev:deploy:
npm run clasp -- push && npm run set-dev-env && npm run clasp -- deploy -i "${npm_package_config_CLASP_DEV_TEST_DEPLOYMENT_ID}" && echo "
Development deployment updated to latest code. Access via: ${npm_package_config_GAS_BASE_DOMAIN}/${npm_package_config_CLASP_DEV_TEST_DEPLOYMENT_ID}${npm_package_config_GAS_EXEC_PATH}
" || (echo "
ERROR: dev:deploy failed!
" && exit 1)
scripts.stage:push: npm run set-dev-env &&  npm run clasp -- push
scripts.stage:redeploy: npm run set-dev-env && npm run clasp -- deploy --deploymentId "${npm_package_config_CLASP_STAGING_DEPLOYMENT_ID}" --versionNumber "$(npm run clasp -- versions | tail -n 1 | awk '{print $1}')" --description "Staging"
scripts.stage:deploy: npm run stage:push && npm run create-version && npm run stage:redeploy && echo "\nStaging deployment updated to latest code and versioned with Git. Access via: ${npm_package_config_GAS_BASE_DOMAIN}/${npm_package_config_CLASP_STAGING_DEPLOYMENT_ID}${npm_package_config_GAS_EXEC_PATH}\n"
scripts.prod:push: npm run set-prod-env && npm run clasp -- push
scripts.prod:open: npm run set-prod-env && npm run clasp -- open
scripts.prod:deployments: npm run set-prod-env && npm run clasp -- deployments
scripts.prod:versions: npm run set-prod-env && echo "Git Tag: $(git describe --tags --always)" && echo "Git Commit: $(git rev-parse --short HEAD)" && echo "\n--- GAS Versions ---" && npm run clasp -- versions
scripts.prod:redeploy-live: npm run set-prod-env  && npm run clasp -- deploy --deploymentId "${npm_package_config_CLASP_PROD_LIVE_DEPLOYMENT_ID}" --versionNumber "$(npm run clasp -- versions | tail -n 1 | awk '{print $1}')" --description "Production $(git describe --tags --always)"
scripts.prod:deploy-live: npm run prod:push && npm run create-version && npm run prod:redeploy-live && echo "\nProduction deployment updated to $(git describe --tags --always) - GAS Version: $(npm run clasp -- versions | tail -n 1 | awk '{print $1}') - Access via: ${npm_package_config_GAS_BASE_DOMAIN}/${npm_package_config_CLASP_PROD_LIVE_DEPLOYMENT_ID}${npm_package_config_GAS_EXEC_PATH}\n"
